Clip from the Met + More

Mar 26, 2019 • Yohan Belmin

Here’s a little update from me since last January: 

1) Here’s a clip of my performance in “La Fille du Régiment” @ the Met;  2) Here is a fun time-lapse of the make-up process to age me for the role of the Notary; 3) + my name was mentioned in a review of the opera!

Finally, I’d like to give a shout-out to my good friend, former roommate AND former finalist of the Voice Switzerland, Rahel Buchhold. Alongside Rose Clark, they released their first EP Blue Desert on Spotify as the duet “Rahel n’ Rose”.

Here’s to Spring everyone, hope you’re doing well!

Much love,

-Yohan
